title: ‘Survivor,’ Season 42, Episode 1 With Boston Rob
description:
Tyson and Riley are joined by ‘Survivor’ legend Boston Rob to break down the first episode of the new season. They share their thoughts on the current fast-paced format, explain why going all out in the first challenge is unwise, and discuss the amulet advantage and how it can be used. Plus, they compare their 39-day seasons to the current 26-day one and close by handing out superlatives.
Hosts: Tyson Apostol and Riley McAtee
Guest: Boston Rob
Associate Producer: Mike Wargon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
